metadata.title: CVE-2024-45618 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in pkcs15-init in OpenSC. An attacker could use acrafted USB Device or Smart Card, which would present the system with aspecially crafted response to APDUs.Insufficient or missing checking of return values of functions leads tounexpected work with variables that have not been initialized.

criterions.comment: opensc package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
